laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: DNA mutation analysis for V717L mutation in APP gene
laboratory_examinations.findings: Four of 15 embryos tested for maternal mutation were mutation-free. Two PGD cycles resulted in 8 oocytes in the first cycle with 2 affected; and 15 oocytes in the second cycle with 6 normal and 7 affected.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The first cycle had affected embryos, while the second cycle identified normal embryos for transfer, leading to a successful pregnancy.
